landing-page-radio.legend: Which form would you like to explore?

basic-form.label: Basic form - A linear form showcasing the different Field types available in HOF

complex-form.label: Complex form - A form demonstrating more complex features such as journey forking, save-and-return and more

incomeTypes.label: Sources of income
incomeTypes.legend: Select the options where you receive income from
incomeTypes.hint: Select all options that apply to you.

phone.label: Phone number
phone.hint: International phone numbers require the international dialling code, for example +33235066182

countrySelect.label: Select a country
countrySelect.hint: Start to type the country name and options will appear

landing-page.intro: Choose one of the options below and press continue.

build-your-own-form.title: Build your own form
build-your-own-form.subheader: Access the build your own form guidance link

dob.header: What is your date of birth?

address.header: What is your address in the UK?
address.intro: If you have no fixed address, enter an address where we can contact you.

checkboxes.header: Where does your money come from each month?

radio.header: What country was the appeal lodged?

country-select.header: What country is your address located?

text-input-area.header: What are the details of your complaint?
text-input-area.intro: Briefly summarise your complaint. Include anything that can help our investigation.

select.intro: Choose an appeal stage from the drop down menu

confirm.header: Check your answers before submitting your application.

confirmation.title: Application sent
confirmation.content: Weâ€™ll contact you with the decision of your application or if we need more information from you.

landing-page-radio.required: Select an option below and press continue

dateOfBirth.default: Enter your date of birth in the correct format; for example, 31 10 1990
dateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

building.default: Enter details of your building and street

townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

incomeTypes.default: Select all options that apply to you.

countryOfHearing.default: Select where the appeal hearing is to be held

countrySelect.default: Enter a valid country of residence

email.default: Enter your email address in the correct format

int-phone-number.internationalPhoneNumber: Enter a valid international phone number

complaintDetails.default: Enter details about why you are making a complaint

appealStages.required: Select an appeal stage from the list
